name: Build America Bonds
objective: The baseline tax system would not allow credits for particular activities or targeting specific groups. In contrast, the Tax Code in 2009 allowed State and local governments to issue taxable bonds through 2010 and receive a direct payment from Treasury equal to 35 percent of interest expenses. Alternatively, State and local governments could issue taxable bonds and the private lenders would receive the 35 percent credit which is included in taxable income.
categories: Tax Expenditures - General Purpose Fiscal Assistance
